actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-147, by Mr. Wheat.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2282 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Providing for the consideration of the bill in the Committee of the Whole under an open rule. Measure will be read by section. It shall be in order to consider the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology now printed in the bill as original bill for the purpose of amendment.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 36.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2282) to amend the National Science Foundation Authorization Act of 1988, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2282 (science funding).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2282) to amend the National Science Foundation Authorization Act of 1988, and for other purposes.
